name: TacOps (itch)
description:
Goal is simple: Complete the mission!

How to do it? Use cover, tactics and positioning to outsmart your enemy!

Controls:

  • Mouse for selection and commands.
  • WASD for camera movement
  • SPACE for pause
  • Some buttons with more stuff

Play time: Tutorial Mission and Defense Mission, each 5 mins or so

Made in 2wks, using Unity and some assets:

  • Custom developed framework
  • Some paid assets like audio, 3D models, icons,...
  • UltEvents Free (AssetStore)
  • MMFeedbacks Free (GitHub)
